mcq.statement: What is the specific heat capacity of a substance?

options.a: The amount of heat required to raise the temperature of 1 kg of the substance by 1°C
options.b: The amount of heat required to melt 1 kg of the substance
options.c: The amount of heat required to boil 1 kg of the substance
options.d: The amount of heat required to raise the temperature of 1 g of the substance by 1°C
